name: Marble Lounge
description:
Lose your marbles in this fun tiki themed game!

Simple three-in-row casual game. The rules are simple. Drag the marble, aim and shoot. You can bounce of the sides to hit those tricky spots. Get the power-ups to get you on the local or even the global high-score.

The more points you get, the higher level you reach...and the faster you have to react! When the cocktail reaches the bottom, you get more marbles to deal with. And the drinking gets faster and faster as you get more points.

This is the game for you, if you like any other casual puzzle game. And it's free!
